post.author: 허현옥
post.content:
I think I will use this site as my seminar material. This is official tutorial site ( It is from java.sun.com... duh~ ) and They have very well organized and explained documents.

If you are interested in this seminar, please look around that site before the class.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/index.html
post.title: Prepare for the class :)
